knimeNode.name: Spark Row Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: The Spark Row Filter allows rows to be excluded from the input Spark DataFrame/RDD.

fullDescription.intro:
This node allows rows to be filtered from the input Spark DataFrame/RDD by adding and grouping conditions.
This node requires at least Apache Spark 2.0.
fullDescription.option: This list contains the conditions and groups.
Add condition to the list. If a logical operator is selected it will be added to that, if a condition is selected it will be added to the parent logical operator.
Create a new logical operator and put the selected condition below.
Delete the selected logical operator and put the conditions from it to the parent logical operator.
Delete the selected element from the list.

ports.inPort: Spark DataFrame/RDD from which rows are to be excluded.
